column3: My mom takes care of me so much. I feel like she is Mother Teresa!
Things are getting better and better for me everyday.  I'm still waiting for my big break but I'm in no rush.
The most awful time of my life was when my wife went to jail for a month. I'm glad it's all over.

My son stayed the night with his grandparents recently. When they brought him home he had a present for me! He had planted some herbs in a little planter box that he'd helped build. I was caught off guard and it made me so happy.
